column2: "Asɛm a ofi EWURADZE hɔ baa Jeremia nkyɛn
column6: na sian kɔ ɔwemfo no ne fie
column7: na hɔ na mebɛma atse me nsɛm."

column2: "Nna misianee kɔr ɔwemfo no ne fie
column5: nna ɔreyɛ n'edwuma wɔ nhwiir do."

column2: "Na ber a ɔsɛn a ɔdze awendɛtse reyɛ no
column3: sɛɛe wɔ ɔwemfo no nsamu no
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔwemfo noara hwɛ a oye no."

column2: "Nna EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ
column6: aso murunntum mmfa hom nnyɛ dɛ ɔwemfo yi? EWURADZE na ɔse. Hwɛ
column7: mbrɛ awendɛtse tse wɔ ɔwemfo nsamu no
column8: mbrɛ hom tse wɔ me nsamu ara nye no

column2: "Aber biara a mebɛkasa wɔ ɔman bi ho
"sɛ ɔman no a makasa hɔn ho no wɔsan fi hɔn emumuyɛ ho a
column3: mebɛsesa m'adwen wɔ mbusu a modween dɛ medze bɔbɔ hɔn no ho."

column2: "Na aber biara a mebɛkasa ɔman bi ho na ahendzi bi ho
"sɛ ɔbɔ mbusu wɔ m'enyi do
column4: ɔnodze mebɛsesa m'adwen wɔ papa a mekaa dɛ medze bɛyɛ hɔn mfaso nyinara ho."

column2: "Na afei kɔ ɛ
column6: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Hwɛ
column8: na merepam apam bi etsia hom: afei hom mu biara nsan mfi no mbusu kwan ho
column9: na hom nyɛ hom akwan na hom ndzeyɛɛ yie."

column2: "Naaso hɔn dze
column4: Enyidado bi nnyi hɔ: na yebedzi hɛnankasa hɛn tsirmsɛm ekyir
column5: na hɛn mu biara aka n'akoma bɔn ne ntsintsiman do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Afei hom mbisa amanaman mu dɛ woana atse dɛm ndzɛmba yi bi da; Israel ɔbaabun no ayɛ adze a ɔyɛ hu papaapa."
"Aso Lebanon esukwankyɛba bɛsa wɔ kwaa mu ɔbotan do? Anaa aso amanandze nsubansuba nwinwin a ɔrepem sian no bɔwew a?"
"Naaso me man werɛ efir me
column3: wɔhyew nduhuam ma egyangyandze; na wɔama woefintsiw hɔn akwan mu

column2: "reyɛ hɔn asaase amamfo na daa asesardze. Obiara a ɔfa do no no ho bow no
"Mobɔbɔ hɔn apetse wɔ atamfo enyim dɛ boka mframa; mebɛdan m'ekyir ama hɔn na nnyɛ m'enyim bi a
column3: wɔ hɔn mbusu da no mu."

column2: "Nna wɔkaa dɛ
column3: Hom mbra ma yɛnkɛpam Jeremia ne tsir do; osiandɛ mbra no rennhera mmfi ɔsɔfo hɔ
column5: anaa asɛm no efi nkɔnhyɛnyi hɔ. Hom mbra ma yɛmfa tɛkyerɛma mbɔ no
column6: na mma yenntsie ne nsɛm biara."

column2: "Ao EWURADZE
column4: na tsie dza hɔn a wɔnye me ridzi esi no ka."

column2: "Aso wɔdze mbusu botua papa kaw? Naaso hɔn dze
column3: woefun mona ama me kra. Kaa mbrɛ migyinaa w'enyim dɛ mereka papa ama hɔn
column4: dɛ meredan w'ebufuw efi hɔn do no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi yi hɔn mba ma ɔkɔm
column3: na gyaa hɔn mu hyɛ afona no tum nsa; na ma hɔn yernom ndzi mba ho nsaansa
column4: na wɔnyɛ ekunafo. Ma owuyarba nku hɔn mbarimba
column5: na hɔn mberantsɛ nwu afona ano wɔ ɔko mu."

column2: "Ma wɔntse osu nka wɔ hɔn efiefi mu
column3: ber a edze dɔm bɛba hɔn do awerɛfir mu no; osiandɛ woefun mona dɛ wɔdze rekyer me

column2: "Naaso ɔwo
column4: inyim hɔn apam a wɔpam mo do dze eboku me nyinara; mma mmfa hɔn emumuyɛ nnkyɛ hɔn
column5: eso mma mmpepa hɔn bɔn mmfi w'enyi do: na mbom ma wombutuw hɔn wɔ w'enyim; enye hɔn ndzi wɔ w'ebufuw ber no mu."
